content: आहार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रा|री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Bringing near, procuring, getting; भाराहारः कार्यवशात् <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} Going to fetch; अयं गच्छति भर्ता मे फलाहारो महावनं <ls>Sāv. 4 23.</ls> --रः {@--1@} Taking, fetching, or bringing near. {@--2@} Employing, using. {@--3@} Taking food. {@--4@} Food; (आहरंति रसमस्मादित्याहारः <ls>Sk.</ls>); °वृत्तिमकरोत् <ls>Pt. 1</ls> took his dinner; फलाहार, °वृत्तिः means of livelihood; भैक्षाहारः living on alms; यवाहार, निराहार &c.
